title: *Top Floor 1-Bedroom Apartment w/Private Roofdeck Terrace* 31 6G
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties* We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building", '*Top Floor 1-Bedroom Apartment w/Private Roofdeck Terrace*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*OCTOBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', "Broker fee of 1 month's rent is due at the lease signing", '*The Apartment Features:*', '1 Queen-Size Bedroom / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Great Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / Spacious Living Space that Can Accommodate a Full Set of Entertainment Furniture & a Dining Table, Leading to a *Private Roofdeck Terrace* / AC Unit in Each Room / L-Shaped Kitchen Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / Exposed Brick Throughout / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Lounge / Laundry Room / Massive Rooftop / Package Room / Parking Garage* / Storage* / Bike Room / Elevator /', 'A Step Away from the C Train at Kingston-Throop Station /', 'A Short walk to the A Train at Nostrand Ave Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $118,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"Insuret" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
